detect.title: Detect Ollama Services
detect.description:
Please enter the Ollama service URLs to detect, one per line.
Example: http://localhost:11434

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
items: 1. This website is for security research and educational purposes only. All service information is from public data.
2. If you find your service listed here, it's recommended to enhance your network security measures.
3. We are not responsible for any direct or indirect losses caused by using the information on this site.
4. Please comply with local laws and regulations. Do not use this information for any illegal activities.
